reference.title: Product Name Standard Document
reference.organization: Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center

entry.name: no_precip_at_station
entry.description: No precipitation at the station at the time of observation

entry.name: no_precip_fog
entry.description: no precipitation, fog, ice fog (except for 11 and 12), duststorm, sandstorm, drifting or blowing snow at the station at the time of observation or, execpt for 09 and 17, during the preceding hour

entry.name: photometeors
entry.description: No meteors except photometeors

entry.name: cld_dev_not_obs
entry.description: Cloud development not observed or not observable (characteristic change of the state of sky during the past hour)

entry.name: cld_dissolvg
entry.description: Cloud generally dissolving or becoming less developed (characteristic change of the state of sky during the past hour)

entry.name: sky_unchanged
entry.description: State of sky on the whole unchanged (characteristic change of the state of sky during the past hour)

entry.name: cld_forming
entry.description: Clouds generally forming of developing (characteristic change of the state of sky during the past hour)

entry.name: haze_dust_sand_smoke
entry.description: Haze, dust, sand or smoke

entry.name: smoke_fire_ashes
entry.description: Visibility reduced by smoke, e.g. veldt or forest fires, industrial smoke or volcanic ashes

entry.name: haze
entry.description: Haze

entry.name: dust_suspension
entry.description: Widespread dust in suspension in the air, not raised by wind at or near the station at the time of observation
dust_sand_seaspray

Dust or sand raised by wind at or near the station at the time of observation, but no well-developed dust whirl(s) or sand whirl(s), and no duststorm or sandstorm seen: or, in the case of sea stations and coastal stations, blowing spray at the station

entry.name: dust_sand_whirl
entry.description: Well-developed dust whirl(s) or sand whirl(s), seen at or near the station during the preceding hour or at the same time of observation, but no duststorm or sandstorm

entry.name: dust_sand_storm
entry.description: Well-developed dust whirl(s) or sand whirl(s), seen at or near the station during the preceding hour or at the same time of observation, but no duststorm or sandstorm

entry.name: mist
entry.description: mist

entry.name: patchy_fog
entry.description: patches of shallow fog or ice fog at the station, whether on land or sea, not deeper than about 2 meters on land or 10 meters at sea

entry.name: contin_fog
entry.description: more or less continuous shallow fog or ice fog at the station, whether on land or sea, not deeper than about 2 meters on land or 10 meters at sea

entry.name: lightning_vis_no_thunder
entry.description: lightning visible, no thunder heard

entry.name: precip_in_sight_not_ground
entry.description: precipitation within sight, not reaching the ground or the surface of the sea

entry.name: precip_in_sight_ground
entry.description: precipitation within sight, reaching the ground or the surface of the sea, but distant, i.e. estimated to be more thatn 5km from the station

entry.name: precip_in_sight_near
entry.description: precipitation within sight, reaching the ground or the surface of the sea, but distant, i.e. estimated to be more thatn 5km from the station

entry.name: thunder_no_precip
entry.description: Thunderstorm, but no precipitation at time of observation

entry.name: squalls
entry.description: Squalls at or within sight of the station during the preceding hour or at the time of observation

entry.name: funnel_cloud
entry.description: funnel cloud(s) (Tornado cloud or waterspout) at or within sight of the station during the preceding hour or at the time of observation

entry.name: precip_fog_thunder
entry.description: Precipitation, fog, ice fog or thunderstorm at the station during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation

entry.name: drizzle
entry.description: Drizzle (not freezing) or snow grains not falling as shower(s)

entry.name: rain
entry.description: Rain (not freezing)

entry.name: snow_not_shwrs
entry.description: Snow not falling as shower(s)

entry.name: rain_snow_icep
entry.description: Rain and snow or ice pellets not falling as shower(s)

entry.name: frzg_drizzle_rain
entry.description: Freezing drizzle or freezing rain not falling as shower(s)

entry.name: showers_rain
entry.description: Shower(s) of rain

entry.name: showers_snow_rain
entry.description: Shower(s) of snow, or of rain and snow

entry.name: shwrs_hail
entry.description: Shower(s) of hail (hail, small hail, or snow pellets), or of rain and hail

entry.name: fog_ice_fog
entry.description: Fog or ice fog

entry.name: thunderstorm
entry.description: Thunderstorm (with or without precipitation)

entry.name: dust_sand_snow
entry.description: duststorm, sandstorm, drifting or blowing snow

entry.name: slt_mod_dust_sand_decrs
entry.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm has decreased during the preceding hour

entry.name: slt_mod_dust_sand_same
entry.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm no appreciable change during the preceding hour

entry.name: slt_mod_dust_sand_incr
entry.description: Slight or moderate duststorm or sandstorm has begun or has increased during the preceding hour

entry.name: svr_dust_sand_dcrs
entry.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm has decreased during the preceding hour

entry.name: svr_dust_sand_same
entry.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm no appreciable change during the preceding hour

entry.name: svr_dust_sand_incs
entry.description: Severe duststorm or sandstorm has begun or has increased during the preceding hour

entry.name: slt_mod_drftg_snow
entry.description: Slight or moderate drifting snow generally low (below eye level)

entry.name: hvy_drftg_snow
entry.description: Heavy drifting snow generally low (below eye level)

entry.name: slt_mod_blwg_snow
entry.description: Slight or moderate blowing snow generally high (above eye level)

entry.name: hvy_blwg_snow
entry.description: Heavy blowing snow generally high (above eye level)

entry.name: fog_or_ice_fog
entry.description: Fog or ice fog at the time of observation

entry.name: fog_or_ice_fog_dist
entry.description: Fog or ice fog at a distance at the time of observation, but not at the station during the preceding hour, the fog or ice fog extending to a level above that of the observer

entry.name: fog_or_ice_fog_patch
entry.description: Fog or ice fog in patches

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_vis_thin
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky visible has become thinner during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_invis_thin
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible has become thinner during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_vis_same
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky visible, no appreciable change during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_invis_same
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible, no appreciable change during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_vis_thckr
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky visible, has begun or has become thicker during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_ice_fog_sky_invis_thckr
entry.description: Fog or ice fog, sky invisible has begun or has become thicker during the preceding hour

entry.name: fog_rime_sky_vis
entry.description: Fog, depositing rime, sky visible

entry.name: fog_rime_sky_invis
entry.description: Fog, depositing rime, sky invisible

entry.name: precip_at_station_obs
entry.description: Precipitation at the station at the time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_group
entry.description: Drizzle

entry.name: drizzle_int_slght
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, intermittent, slight at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_contin_slght
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, slight at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_int_mod
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, intermittent, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_contin_mod
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_int_hvy
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, intermittent, heavy (dense) at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_contin_hvy
entry.description: Drizzle, not freezing, continuous, heavy (dense) at time of observation

entry.name: drizzle_frz_slght
entry.description: Drizzle, freezing, slight

entry.name: drizzle_frz_mod_hvy
entry.description: Drizzle, freezing, moderate or heavy (dense)

entry.name: drizzle_rain_slght
entry.description: Drizzle and rain, slight

entry.name: drizzle_rain_mod_hvy
entry.description: Drizzle and rain, moderate or heavy (dense)

entry.name: rain_group
entry.description: Rain

entry.name: rain_int_slgt
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, slight at time of observation

entry.name: rain_contin_slgt
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, slight at time of observation

entry.name: rain_int_mod
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: rain_contin_mod
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: rain_int_hvy
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, intermittent, heavy at time of observation

entry.name: rain_contin_hvy
entry.description: Rain, not freezing, continuous, heavy at time of observation

entry.name: rain_frz_slgt
entry.description: Rain, freezing, slight at time of observation

entry.name: rain_frz_mod_hvy
entry.description: Rain, freezing, moderate or heavy at time of observation

entry.name: rain_drizzle_snow_slgt
entry.description: Rain or drizzle and snow, slight

entry.name: rain_drizzle_snow_mod_hvy
entry.description: Rain or drizzle and snow, moderate or heavy

entry.name: solid_precip_not_shwrs
entry.description: Solid precipitation not in showers

entry.name: int_snowflakes_slgt
entry.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, slight at time of observation

entry.name: contin_snowflakes_slgt
entry.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, slight at time of observation

entry.name: int_snowflakes_mod
entry.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: contin_snowflakes_mod
entry.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, moderate at time of observation

entry.name: int_snowflakes_hvy
entry.description: Intermittent fall of snowflakes, heavy at time of observation

entry.name: contin_snowflakes_hvy
entry.description: Continuous fall of snowflakes, heavy at time of observation

entry.name: diamond_dust
entry.description: diamond dust (with or without fog)

entry.name: snow_grains
entry.description: snow grains (with or without fog)

entry.name: snow_crystals
entry.description: isolated star-like snow crystals (with or without fog)

entry.name: ice_pellets
entry.description: ice_pellets

entry.name: shwr_precip
entry.description: Showery precipitation, or precipitation with current or recent thunderstorm

entry.name: rain_precip_slgt
entry.description: Rain showers, slight

entry.name: rain_precip_mod_hvy
entry.description: Rain showers, moderate or heavy

entry.name: rain_precip_violnt
entry.description: Rain showers, violent

entry.name: shwr_rain_snow_slgt
entry.description: Shower(s) of rain and snow mixed, slight

entry.name: shwr_rain_snow_mod_hvy
entry.description: Shower(s) of rain and snow mixed, moderate or heavy

entry.name: shwr_snow_slgt
entry.description: Snow shower(s), slight

entry.name: shwr_snow_mod_hvy
entry.description: Snow shower(s), moderate or heavy

entry.name: shwr_snow_pllts_slgt
entry.description: Shower(s) of snow pellets or small hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, slight

entry.name: shwr_snow_pllts_mod_hvy
entry.description: Shower(s) of snow pellets or small hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, moderate or heavy

entry.name: shwr_hail_slgt
entry.description: Shower(s) of hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, not associated with thunder, slight

entry.name: shwr_hail_mod_hvy
entry.description: Shower(s) of hail, with or without rain or rain and snow mixed, not associated with thunder, moderate to heavy

entry.name: slgt_rain
entry.description: Slight rain at time of observation, thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

entry.name: mod_hvy_rain
entry.description: Moderate or heavy rain at time of observation, thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

entry.name: slgt_rain_hail
entry.description: Slight snow, or rain and snow mixed or hail at time of observation, thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

entry.name: mod_hvy_rain_hail
entry.description: Moderate or heavy snow, or rain and snow mixed or hail at time of observation, thunderstorm during the preceding hour but not at time of observation

entry.name: thunderstorm_slgt_wo_hail
entry.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, without hail, but with rain and/or snow at time of boservation, thunderstorm at time of observation

entry.name: thunderstorm_slgt_hail
entry.description: Thunderstorm, slight or moderate, with hail at time of observation, thunderstorm at time of observation

entry.name: thunderstorm_hvy_wo_hail
entry.description: Thunderstorm, heavy, without hail, but with rain and/or snow at time of obseration, thunderstorm at time of observation

entry.name: thunderstorm_dust_sand
entry.description: Thunderstorm combined with duststorm or sandstorm at time of obseration, thunderstorm at time of observation

entry.name: thunderstorm_hvy_hail
entry.description: Thunderstorm, heavy, with hail at time of obseration, thunderstorm at time of observation

entry.name: present_wx
entry.description: present weather reported from an automatic weather station

entry.name: no_sig_wx
entry.description: no significant weather observed

entry.name: clds_disslvg
entry.description: clouds generally dissolving or becoming less developed during the past hour

entry.name: sky_unchanged_hour
entry.description: state of sky on the whole unchanged during the past hour

entry.name: clds_formg
entry.description: clouds generally forming or developing during the past hour

entry.name: vis_ge_1km
entry.description: haze or smoke, or dust in suspension in the air, visibility equal to, or greater than, 1 km

entry.name: vis_lt_1km
entry.description: haze or smoke, or dust in suspension in the air, visibility less than 1 km
